data.message: A group with 30k members and no admin are being used to sell illegal Things, for racism and now lately bullying and threatening handicapped. We've reported the group hundred of times and none has taken action. Since there is no admin I tried to take over the group but that doesn't help either. Assistance is needed.

replies.message: Hi Romeo. You can learn to report something in a group in the Help Center: http://bit.ly/2zxr5Bi. -Tenaya
As I've mentioned we've reported the group hundred of times. The group it self is not wrong. The different posts are and they are not removed.
